page.title: 06WORPLESTON GOLF CLUB
page.content: Worpleston Golf Club is situated on th e edge of Worpleston.The club started in 1908.Its founder AW Anderson starte d it when he bought Bridley Manor and soon found there was too much land so he decided to let it out as a golf cou rse.It covers over 250 acres and is op en to the public during the week.But at weekends its members only.There is alot of wildlife.There are around 560 members and 16 employees.They have one famous player called Joyce Weatherhead.She won the mixed foursomes 9 times with 7 different partners.There is a shop,which sells most golfing equipment.There is a prof esional player who gives lessons.There are about 175 players who come per week.But many more at the weekend.They have about 28 trophies.There are about 8 tournaments a year.they have a bar,p ractice net and practice fairway aswel
